item.description:
Feeling Empowered in a Relationship

Do you have relationships where you don't feel a healthy sense of power in it - not power over, just feeling power and validation within yourself and validation from the person you are with. Learn how to feel empowered within yourself and to make sure you are being your real self in a relationship.

7:00 pm - 9:30 pm

(Cost $40 - Sliding scale to $20)


Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a relationship and communication coach and therapist with 30 years experience. He teaches the Enneagram, Myers Briggs and other systems to help people understand and bridge differences. He also does phone consults, teaches and coaches in organizations to help people work together effectively and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram.

Organize a group for your friends, family or associates.

781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Feeling Empowered in a Relationship
